description: This series follows the adventures of Thomas the Tank Engine and all of his engine friends on the Island of Sodor.
keywords: anthropomorphic vehicle,train engine,train,thomas the tank engine,tank locomotive
name: Thomas the Tank Engine & Friends

original_info.id: Thomas & Friends: It's Great to be an Engine_2004
original_info.name: Thomas & Friends: It's Great to be an Engine

review.name: classic series great new and cgi series OK
review.reviewBody: I've been a fan of Thomas all my life and i have to say that the older series is a lot better than the new one. i don't really like how hit entertainment change to cgi but after viewing it the animation was good. most of the episodes aren't that good anymore though. they use a lot of recycled plots and introduce characters we only see once. and hit didn't use characters that they had from previous seasons. i like to view before I give my opinions so ya if Your going to show your kid Thomas show the old episodes first. ill love Thomas for the rest of my life but i just hope hit does better writing in the future and they have with misty island rescue. i give the show an 8 out of 10

trailer.description: Home Video Trailer from HIT Entertainment
trailer.name: Thomas & Friends: It's Great to Be an Engine
